TITLE.P: 17/1766 Electrically powered wheelchairs and propulsion units for manual wheelchairs

SHORT_DESCR.P: Procurement of electrically powered wheelchairs with batteries, battery chargers, accessories and spare parts.
Procurement of propulsion units with batteries, battery chargers, accessories and spare parts.
Accompanying services for electrically powered wheelchairs and propulsion units.

TITLE.P: Item 1 - Electrically powered wheelchairs with manual direct steering for outdoor use with 4 wheels - for adults

SHORT_DESCR.P: Electrically powered wheelchairs with manual direct steering for outdoor use with 4 wheels - for adults as well as accessories, spare parts and accompanying services.
Contract type: Parallel framework agreements.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract, once or several times, for a period of up to 2 years, cf. the Framework Agreement point 1.6.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract, once or several times, for a period of up to 2 years, cf. the Framework Agreement point 1.6.

TITLE.P: Tender submission

SHORT_DESCR.P: Lot 31 is not an actual competition, but only for document submission (tender submission).
Only a signed tender letter shall be uploaded for the lot in question for the lots that tenderers would like to submit a tender for. The same tender letter is to be uploaded in the relevant lots.
All other documentation in the tender is to be submitted together for all lots that the tenderer is tendering for, under this lot 'Tender Submission'.
This is a technical solution to avoid the complete documentation having to be submitted several times when a tenderer is tendering for several items.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: This is only a fictitious lot and it cannot be renewed.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: This is only a fictitious lot and it cannot be renewed.

INFO_ADD.P: Lot 31 is not an actual competition, but only for document submission (tender submission). Only a signed tender letter for the lot in question shall be uploaded for the lots that tenderers would like to submit a tender for. The same tender letter is to be uploaded in the relevant lots. All other documentation in the tender is to be submitted together for all lots that the tenderer.

SUITABILITY.P: Requirement: Norwegian tenderers must have their tax and VAT payments in order.
Documentation requirement: Norwegian tenderers: Tax and VAT certificate from the tax authorities, not older than 6 months from the tender deadline expiry date.
Organisational and legal position of the supplier:
Requirement: Tenderers are required to have a legally established company.
Norwegian tenderers: Company registration certificate from the Brønnøysund Register Centre.
Foreign tenderers: Certificate for registration in the register of business enterprises as prescribed in the legislation of the country in which the supplier is established.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Requirement: Tenderers are required to have the financial ability to fulfill the contract.
Documentation requirement: The contracting authority will obtain a credit rating carried out by Experian; see www.Experian.no
If the tenderer feels that the credit rating will not provide an accurate picture, please send supplementary information together with the qualification application.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Requirement: A good ability to fulfil the contract is required.

Documentation requirement: A description of the tenderer's technical personnel or technical units the tenderer has at their disposition to fulfill the contract, regardless of whether they belong to the company or not. As regards those who do not belong to the company, note the competition documentation's part I point 2.5, as well as point 2 on a self-declaration.
Requirement: A good, well-functioning quality assurance system is required.

Documentation requirement: A description of the tenderer´s quality assurance measures /methods for quality assurance, as well as any certificates issued by independent organs, which confirm fulfillment of quality standards.

ESTIMATED_TIMING.P: In approx. 4 years, provided that the Norwegian Parliament grants the necessary resources.
